text.name: Studious Dedication
text.desc:
Gain ([KnowledgeExplored] x 3% of Max HP) Shield if this Skill is Discarded
[WhenUse] [Discard] 1 Skill of the lowest rank in all of this unit's Skill Slots

text.name: Studious Dedication
text.desc:
Gain ([KnowledgeExplored] x 4% of Max HP) Shield if this Skill is Discarded
[WhenUse] [Discard] 1 Skill of the lowest rank in all of this unit's Skill Slots
[WhenUse] At 2+ [KnowledgeExplored], Clash Power +1
[WinDuel] Gain 2 [KnowledgeTraining] (once per turn)

text.name: Studious Dedication
text.desc:
Gain ([KnowledgeExplored] x 5% of Max HP) Shield if this Skill is Discarded
[WhenUse] [Discard] 1 Skill of the lowest rank in all of this unit's Skill Slots
[WhenUse] Gain ([KnowledgeExplored] - 1) Clash Power (max 2)
[WinDuel] Gain 2 [KnowledgeTraining] (once per turn)

text.name: Moment of Erudition
text.desc:
[StartBattle] Gain [KnowledgeTraining] equal to [KnowledgeExplored] on self
[WhenUse] [Discard] 2 of this unit's Skills in ascending order of ranks from all of its Skill Slots

text.name: Moment of Erudition
text.desc:
Deal +3% damage for every [KnowledgeExplored] on self (max 9%)
[StartBattle] Apply [KnowledgeTraining] equal to [KnowledgeExplored] on self  to a random ally and on self (prioritizes allies with [Discard] that has the least [KnowledgeTraining])
[WhenUse] [Discard] 2 of this unit's Skills in ascending order of ranks from all of its Skill Slots
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1

text.name: Moment of Erudition
text.desc:
Deal +5% damage for every [KnowledgeExplored] on self (max 15%)
[StartBattle] Apply [KnowledgeTraining] equal to [KnowledgeExplored] on self to 2 random allies and on self (prioritizes allies with [Discard] that has the least [KnowledgeTraining])
[WhenUse] [Discard] 2 of this unit's Skills in ascending order of ranks from all of its Skill Slots
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Sinking] on target (max 2)

text.name: Scorch Knowledge
text.desc:
Deal +3% damage for every [KnowledgeExplored] on self (max 18%)
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1
[BeforeAttack] Consume all [KnowledgeTraining] on self and gain half of that value as additional [KnowledgeExplored] (rounded down)
[EndSkill] At 4+ [KnowledgeExplored], reset value to 1 (if this Skill defeats an enemy, reset value to 3 instead)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [Sinking] Potency/Count equal to [KnowledgeExplored] value against the target (how much of that [Sinking] is Potency or Count is randomly determined)

text.name: Scorch Knowledge
text.desc:
Deal +5% damage for every [KnowledgeExplored] (max 45%)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Sinking] on target (max 2)
[BeforeAttack] Consume all [KnowledgeTraining] on self and gain the same value as additional [KnowledgeExplored]
[EndSkill] At 4+ [KnowledgeExplored], reset value to 1 (if this Skill defeats an enemy, reset value to 3 instead)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [Sinking] Potency/Count equal to [KnowledgeExplored] value against the target (how much of that [Sinking] is Potency or Count is randomly determined)

text.name: Fixated Study
text.desc: [WhenUse] [Discard] 1 Skill of the highest rank in all of this unit's Skill Slots

text.name: Fixated Study
text.desc:
[WhenUse] [Discard] 1 Skill of the highest rank in all of this unit's Skill Slots
[WhenUse] Gain +6 Aggro to this Skill Slot next turn

1051001.name: Study Hall
1051001.desc:
Every time an other ally Discards a Skill, apply 1 [KnowledgeTraining] to the ally and self (once per Skill, 3 times per turn)
Turn End: next turn, gain Pierce DMG Up and Blunt DMG Up equal to the number of other allies that Discarded Skills (max 3)

1051021.name: Diligent Learning
1051021.desc:
When 1 ally with the highest max HP Discards a Skill, gain (5 x Discarded Skill rank)% of the max HP as Shield (once per turn)
If the unit has [KnowledgeExplored], multiply the above Shield value by 1.5
